extension.description: Requires firmware beta 8 or higher.[CR]Supports 1080p and 720p resolutions.[CR][CR]SettingsMbox does not update to show HDMI mode changes made using this add-on.[CR][CR]Please run Clean Up before you Uninstall or Disable.[CR][CR]Thanks MINIX-Ken, HardwareGuru, KenV99, Roman_V_M, takoi and Abbe
